breakfast.name_local: 来福士购物中心美食广场
breakfast.location_local: 重庆来福士广场捷盛街8号
breakfast.notes: Breakfast after observation deck visit. Multiple options available in mall food court. Convenient location.
breakfast.notes_local: 参观观景台后用早餐。商场美食广场内有多种选择，方便快捷。

lunch.name_base: Ju Fa Cai Chongqing Jianghu Cuisine
lunch.location_base: Daxi Lane 28, Yuzhong District (near Huguang Guild Hall)
lunch.location_local: 渝中区大溪巷28号（靠近湖广会馆）
lunch.notes: NO HOTPOT (saving for dinner). Authentic Jianghu dishes near Huguang Guild Hall. Popular local restaurant.
lunch.notes_local: 不吃火锅（留着晚上吃）。湖广会馆附近的正宗江湖菜。当地人气餐厅。

dinner.notes: HILLSIDE HOTPOT WITH NIGHT VIEW (南山半山腰). Elevated location with panoramic Chongqing night view. Reservations recommended.
dinner.notes_local: 南山半山腰火锅，可欣赏重庆夜景全景。建议提前预约。

breakfast.location_base: Banshan Yicheng A District, Building 35, Unit 1902
breakfast.notes: Breakfast with family at home. Chinese New Year Eve preparations.
breakfast.notes_local: 在家和家人一起吃早餐。除夕准备中。

lunch.location_base: Banshan Yicheng A District, Building 35, Unit 1902
lunch.notes: Family lunch. Chinese New Year Eve gathering.
lunch.notes_local: 家庭午餐。除夕团聚。

dinner.name_base: Home (Banshan Yicheng) - Chinese New Year Eve Dinner
dinner.name_local: 家（半山逸城）- 年夜饭
dinner.location_base: Banshan Yicheng A District, Building 35, Unit 1902
dinner.notes: Chinese New Year Eve celebration dinner with family. Traditional reunion feast.
dinner.notes_local: 除夕年夜饭，家庭团聚传统盛宴。

breakfast.notes: MUST-VISIT: Most authentic Bazhong breakfast. Famous sauce meat buns (酱肉包子). User-specified restaurant.
breakfast.notes_local: 必去：最正宗的巴中早餐。招牌酱肉包子。指定餐厅。

lunch.notes: MUST-VISIT: Famous for Bazhong-style beef dishes. User-specified restaurant before train departure.
lunch.notes_local: 必去：巴中特色牛肉。指定餐厅，火车出发前用餐。

dinner.location_base: 247 Wuhouci Avenue, Gaosheng Bridge, Wuhou District, Chengdu
dinner.location_local: 成都市武侯区武侯祠大街247号高升桥
dinner.notes: MATURE SICHUAN RESTAURANT near Jinli Ancient Street. Established restaurant with authentic Chengdu flavors. Open during Spring Festival (11:00-21:30). Reservations recommended. Famous for fish-flavored shredded pork (鱼香肉丝), kung pao chicken, and seasonal bamboo shoots. Walking distance from Jinli. Phone: 028-8505-3333. Verified via Google Maps (rating 4.4).
dinner.notes_local: 锦里古街附近的老牌川菜馆。正宗成都味道。春节期间营业（11:00-21:30）。建议预约。招牌菜：鱼香肉丝、宫保鸡丁、时令竹笋。步行可达锦里。电话：028-8505-3333。评分4.4。

breakfast.name_local: 八二小区抄手 - 建设路旗舰店
breakfast.location_base: Building Road 6-8, Jianshe Road District, Chengdu
breakfast.location_local: 成都市建设路建中路6-8号
breakfast.notes: LOCAL CHENGDU BREAKFAST: Famous for authentic Sichuan-style chaoshou (抄手/wontons). Flagship store near user's family home. Opens at 07:00, perfect for early breakfast before panda base visit. Rating: 4.6/5.0. Cost: ¥21 per person. Operating hours: 07:00-20:30 daily. Verified via Gaode Maps.
breakfast.notes_local: 成都本地早餐：正宗四川抄手。旗舰店靠近家。07:00开门，适合早起去熊猫基地前用餐。评分4.6，人均¥21。营业时间：07:00-20:30。

lunch.name_local: 明婷小馆 - 太古里旗舰店
lunch.location_base: Dongda Street, Xiadongda Street No.166, 4th Floor, Chengdu
lunch.location_local: 成都市东大街下东大街166号4楼
lunch.notes: ⚠️ CRITICAL TIMING: Restaurant opens at 11:00 AM (NOT before). User MUST arrive exactly at 11:00 opening time. Only 45-minute window before airport departure (high-risk schedule with zero margin for delays). Rating: 4.7/5.0. Cost: ¥75 per person. Operating hours: Regular 11:00-21:30, Spring Festival 11:00-23:00. Restaurant may need 5-10 minutes after opening for service readiness. Consider backup plan if delayed. Verified via Gaode Maps POI ID: B0KB17BRRJ.
lunch.notes_local: ⚠️ 时间紧迫：餐厅11:00开门（不会提前）。必须准时11:00到达。只有45分钟窗口期就要赶飞机（零容错高风险行程）。评分4.7，人均¥75。营业时间：平时11:00-21:30，春节11:00-23:00。如延误需考虑备选方案。

dinner.name_local: 爱牧牛·和牛烧肉&海鲜自助
dinner.location_base: Zhoujiazui Road 917, Shangbin Life Plaza F4, Hongkou District, Shanghai
dinner.location_local: 上海市虹口区周家嘴路917号上滨生活广场F4层
dinner.cuisine: Japanese Wagyu BBQ Buffet (日式和牛烧肉自助)
dinner.notes: 虹口区自助餐口味榜第1名, MB5+澳洲和牛不限量, 需提前预约 [links: {'gaode_id': 'B0K0VNBOLW'}; rating: 4.8; signature_dishes: Australian MB5+ wagyu (multiple cuts: oyster blade, flank, snowflake sirloin), seafood sashimi, unlimited refills]
dinner.notes_local: 虹口区自助餐口味榜第1名。MB5+澳洲和牛不限量。需提前预约。评分4.8。招牌：澳洲MB5+和牛（多部位：牛肩胛、牛腹肉、雪花西冷）、海鲜刺身、无限续加。

breakfast.location_base: Jiujiang Road 501, Room 106, Huangpu District (near Nanjing East Road Metro Station Exit 4, 100m walk)
breakfast.location_local: 黄浦区九江路501号106室（靠近南京东路地铁站4号口，步行100米）
breakfast.notes: INFJ-FRIENDLY: Cozy specialty coffee shop near hotel. Perfect for morning coffee and light breakfast before city exploration. Convenient location for start of People's Square/Bund day. Verified via Gaode Maps POI ID: B0L6K9D71B.
breakfast.notes_local: 温馨精品咖啡店，靠近酒店。适合早晨喝咖啡、简单早餐后开始城市探索。位置方便。

lunch.name_local: 人和馆 - 肇嘉浜路店
lunch.location_base: Zaojiabang Road 407, Xuhui District (230m walk from Jiashan Road Metro Station Exit 5)
lunch.location_local: 徐汇区肇嘉浜路407号（距嘉善路地铁站5号口步行230米）
lunch.notes: MICHELIN-RECOMMENDED: Authentic Shanghai local cuisine (本帮菜). Rating: 4.8/5.0. Cost: ¥186 per person. Operating hours: Mon-Fri 11:00-14:00, 17:00-21:30; Sat-Sun 11:00-14:00, 16:30-21:30. Famous for classic Shanghai dishes. Business area: Fenglin Road (枫林路). Verified via Gaode Maps POI ID: B0FFF407ML. Also available: Jing'an Temple Branch (静安寺店) at Yuyuan Road 142 if preferred.

dinner.location_base: Jiangning Road 445, Shimei Building 4F Room 402, Jing'an District
dinner.location_local: 静安区江宁路445号时美大厦4楼402室
dinner.notes: USER-SPECIFIED RESTAURANT (Option 3/3): Premium Japanese yakiniku (charcoal grill). Rating: 4.5/5.0. Cost: ¥127 per person. Operating hours: 11:30-14:00, 17:00-23:00 (Spring Festival 2026-02-16 to 2026-02-21: 16:00-22:00). High-quality grilled meats. Reservations strongly recommended. Phone: 021 6446 9999. Verified via Gaode Maps POI ID: B0FFIVKQPF and Google Maps Place ID: ChIJEXBMOhlwsjURIlaJlMRNRIM.

breakfast.notes: Early breakfast before Shanghai Disneyland full day. Quick and convenient.
breakfast.notes_local: 迪士尼全天游玩前的早餐。快速方便。

lunch.name_local: 上海迪士尼乐园园内餐饮
lunch.notes: Lunch inside Disneyland. Multiple themed restaurants available. Budget for park food prices.
lunch.notes_local: 迪士尼园内午餐。有多个主题餐厅。注意园内物价较高。

dinner.name_local: 上海迪士尼乐园园内或迪士尼小镇
dinner.location_local: 上海迪士尼度假区/迪士尼小镇
dinner.notes: Dinner at Disneyland or nearby Disneytown. Many options after park closes.
dinner.notes_local: 迪士尼园内或迪士尼小镇晚餐。闭园后有很多选择。

breakfast.name_local: M Stand咖啡 - 仙乐斯广场店
breakfast.location_base: Nanjing West Road 388, Xianlesi Plaza F1
breakfast.location_local: 南京西路388号仙乐斯广场F1层
breakfast.notes: REAL VERIFIED CAFE: M Stand specialty coffee near hotel. Opens 07:00-20:00. Rating: 4.3/5.0. Cost: ¥28 per person. Good for morning coffee and light breakfast before city exploration. Verified via Gaode Maps POI ID: B0JAPZ0QF3.
breakfast.notes_local: 精品咖啡店，靠近酒店。营业时间07:00-20:00。评分4.3。人均¥28。适合早晨喝咖啡、简单早餐后开始城市探索。

lunch.name_base: Waitan Jiayan Shanghai Cuisine - Bund Yuyuan Branch
lunch.name_local: 外滩家宴·上海菜 - 外滩豫园店
lunch.location_local: 中山东二路22号2楼（外滩22号）
lunch.notes: REAL VERIFIED RESTAURANT: Authentic Shanghai local cuisine near Bund/Nanjing Road. Perfect for Day 7 itinerary (Suzhou Creek → Bund → Nanjing Road → Pudong cycling). Rating: 4.8/5.0. Cost: ¥135 per person. Operating hours: 10:30-22:00 (Spring Festival 2026-02-16 to 2026-02-23: 10:00-23:00). Convenient location for Bund visit. Verified via Gaode Maps POI ID: B0L1NUX1KY.
lunch.notes_local: 正宗上海本帮菜，靠近外滩/南京路。适合第7天行程（苏州河→外滩→南京路→浦东骑行）。评分4.8，人均¥135。营业时间：10:30-22:00（春节期间10:00-23:00）。

dinner.name_base: Bairong New Shandong Cuisine & Jiaodong Seafood
dinner.name_local: 白茸·新派鲁菜·胶东海鲜·米其林指南
dinner.location_base: BFC Bund Financial Center North Area, Zhongshan East 2nd Road 558, Building 2, 104a
dinner.location_local: 外滩金融中心BFC北区中山东二路558号2幢104a
dinner.notes: ⚠️ PRICE CORRECTED: ¥455 per person (NOT ¥280). MICHELIN GUIDE restaurant. Specializes in new-style Shandong cuisine and Jiaodong seafood. Rating: 4.4/5.0. Operating hours: 11:00-14:30, 17:00-21:30. Upscale dining experience for last full night in Shanghai. RESERVATIONS HIGHLY RECOMMENDED. Verified via Gaode Maps POI ID: B0K6RAD55W.
dinner.notes_local: ⚠️ 价格更正：人均¥455（不是¥280）。米其林指南餐厅。新派鲁菜和胶东海鲜。评分4.4。营业时间：11:00-14:30、17:00-21:30。上海最后一晚的高端用餐体验。强烈建议预约。

breakfast.notes: Early morning flight (9:05). Quick breakfast at airport before boarding.
breakfast.notes_local: 早班飞机（9:05）。登机前在机场快速用早餐。

lunch.notes: Lunch after arrival (11:25) and before university registration. Near Haidian area.
lunch.notes_local: 到达后午餐（11:25到）。大学注册前用餐。海淀区附近。

dinner.location_base: Near theater for 'Only This Green' dance drama
dinner.location_local: 只此青绿舞剧剧院附近
dinner.notes: Quick dinner before evening dance drama performance. Light meal recommended.
dinner.notes_local: 晚间舞剧演出前快速晚餐。建议吃清淡些。

breakfast.location_local: 桔子酒店中关村学院桥店
breakfast.notes: Hotel breakfast before girlfriend's orientation. Check-out and move to rental apartment.
breakfast.notes_local: 女朋友报到前在酒店吃早餐。退房后搬去短租公寓。

lunch.location_base: Shuangqing Road, Tsinghua University South Area Building 7
lunch.location_local: 清华大学南区7号楼双清路
lunch.notes: University canteen experience. Authentic student dining. Affordable and convenient during campus tour.
lunch.notes_local: 大学食堂体验。正宗学生餐，实惠方便。参观校园时顺便吃。

dinner.notes: First dinner at new rental. Establish nearby dining options for girlfriend's comfort zone.
dinner.notes_local: 搬到新住处后的第一顿晚餐。帮女朋友熟悉附近的吃饭选择。

breakfast.notes: Local breakfast spot. Baozi, jianbing, or doujiang options.
breakfast.notes_local: 本地早餐店。包子、煎饼或豆浆。

lunch.notes: Lunch in university neighborhood. Many student-friendly options. After dance studio registration.
lunch.notes_local: 大学周边午餐。学生餐选择多。舞蹈工作室注册后用餐。

dinner.notes: Wudaokou has excellent Korean food. Popular with students. Evening after girlfriend finishes class.
dinner.notes_local: 五道口韩餐很好。学生区人气旺。女朋友下课后晚餐。

breakfast.notes: Wednesday - girlfriend has class. Quick breakfast near apartment.
breakfast.notes_local: 周三——女朋友上课。公寓附近快速早餐。

lunch.notes: NO FAR TRIPS (girlfriend has class). Stay near apartment during day.
lunch.notes_local: 不要跑远（女朋友有课）。白天待在公寓附近。

dinner.notes: Evening activities possible after girlfriend's class. Casual dinner together.
dinner.notes_local: 女朋友下课后可以安排活动。休闲晚餐。

breakfast.notes: Thursday - girlfriend has class. Local breakfast.
breakfast.notes_local: 周四——女朋友上课。本地早餐。

lunch.notes: NO FAR TRIPS (girlfriend has class). Stay near apartment during day.
lunch.notes_local: 不要跑远（女朋友有课）。白天待在公寓附近。

dinner.notes: Evening activities possible. Copper pot hotpot (铜锅涮肉) is Beijing specialty.
dinner.notes_local: 晚上可以安排活动。铜锅涮肉是北京特色。

breakfast.notes: Friday - full day available. Breakfast before Forbidden City visit.
breakfast.notes_local: 周五——全天可用。故宫参观前吃早餐。

lunch.name_local: 方砖厂69号炸酱面（南锣鼓巷店）
lunch.notes: Famous Beijing zhajiangmian (fried sauce noodles). Near Nanluoguxiang area. Authentic local food.
lunch.notes_local: 著名的北京炸酱面。靠近南锣鼓巷。正宗地道美食。

dinner.location_local: 帽儿胡同乙43号（近什刹海地铁）
dinner.notes: Authentic Beijing copper pot lamb hotpot (铜锅涮肉). Traditional dining experience. Near 798 or Nanluoguxiang area.
dinner.notes_local: 正宗北京铜锅涮羊肉。传统用餐体验。靠近798或南锣鼓巷。

breakfast.notes: Cozy coffee shop day. INFJ-friendly atmosphere. Good for girlfriend's photography interest.
breakfast.notes_local: 舒适的咖啡店日。安静氛围。适合女朋友的摄影爱好。

lunch.notes: Lunch in Sanlitun shopping area. Many cute shops nearby. Fashion shopping opportunities.
lunch.notes_local: 三里屯购物区午餐。周边很多可爱小店。时尚购物好去处。

dinner.notes: Dinner in artistic 798 area. Many creative restaurants. Matches girlfriend's interests.
dinner.notes_local: 798艺术区晚餐。很多创意餐厅。符合女朋友的喜好。

breakfast.notes: Saturday - free day. Flexible breakfast timing.
breakfast.notes_local: 周六——自由日。早餐时间灵活。

lunch.notes: Must-try Beijing roast duck (北京烤鸭). Recommend Quanjude or Da Dong. Make reservations.
lunch.notes_local: 必吃北京烤鸭。推荐全聚德或大董。需要预约。

dinner.notes: Casual dinner near apartment. Free day schedule.
dinner.notes_local: 公寓附近休闲晚餐。自由日行程。

breakfast.name_base: Breakfast near Apartment or Train Station
breakfast.name_local: 公寓或火车站附近早餐
breakfast.notes: If Tianjin day trip: early breakfast before train. Otherwise local breakfast.
breakfast.notes_local: 如果去天津一日游：坐火车前早点吃早餐。否则就在本地吃。

lunch.name_local: 天津特色餐厅（如一日游）
lunch.notes: IF TIANJIN TRIP: Try goubuli baozi (狗不理包子), erduoyan zhagao (耳朵眼炸糕). Otherwise lunch in Beijing.
lunch.notes_local: 如果去天津：尝尝狗不理包子、耳朵眼炸糕。否则在北京吃午餐。

dinner.name_local: 返回北京 - 本地餐厅
dinner.notes: Return from Tianjin or Beijing dinner. Relaxed evening meal.
dinner.notes_local: 天津返回或北京晚餐。轻松的晚餐。

breakfast.notes: Tuesday - girlfriend has class. Local breakfast.
breakfast.notes_local: 周二——女朋友上课。本地早餐。

lunch.notes: NO FAR TRIPS (girlfriend has class). Stay near apartment during day.
lunch.notes_local: 不要跑远（女朋友有课）。白天待在公寓附近。

dinner.notes: Evening activities possible after class. Wudaokou has good Japanese restaurants.
dinner.notes_local: 下课后可以安排活动。五道口有不错的日本餐厅。

breakfast.notes: Wednesday - girlfriend has class. Local breakfast.
breakfast.notes_local: 周三——女朋友上课。本地早餐。

lunch.notes: NO FAR TRIPS (girlfriend has class). Stay near apartment during day.
lunch.notes_local: 不要跑远（女朋友有课）。白天待在公寓附近。

dinner.notes: Evening activities possible. Spicy Sichuan food. Many options in university area.
dinner.notes_local: 晚上可以安排活动。麻辣川菜。大学城选择多。

breakfast.notes: Thursday - girlfriend has class. Local breakfast.
breakfast.notes_local: 周四——女朋友上课。本地早餐。

lunch.notes: NO FAR TRIPS (girlfriend has class). Stay near apartment during day.
lunch.notes_local: 不要跑远（女朋友有课）。白天待在公寓附近。

dinner.notes: Evening activities possible. Change of pace with Western food. Pizza or pasta options.
dinner.notes_local: 晚上可以安排活动。换换口味吃西餐。披萨或意面。

breakfast.notes: Final day together. Special brunch experience. Make it memorable.
breakfast.notes_local: 在一起的最后一天。特别的早午餐体验。留下美好回忆。

lunch.notes: Lunch during final shopping trip. Mall dining convenient.
lunch.notes_local: 最后一次购物时的午餐。商场内用餐方便。

dinner.notes: FINAL DINNER TOGETHER. Memorable and romantic. Choose nice restaurant with good ambiance. Make reservations.
dinner.notes_local: 最后的告别晚餐。浪漫难忘。选一家氛围好的餐厅。需要预约。

breakfast.notes: Departure day. Light breakfast. Time for final goodbyes.
breakfast.notes_local: 出发日。简单早餐。最后的告别时间。

lunch.location_base: Beijing Capital Airport or near apartment
lunch.location_local: 北京首都机场或公寓附近
lunch.notes: Depends on departure time. Airport meal or final lunch together before goodbye.
lunch.notes_local: 取决于出发时间。机场用餐或最后一顿午餐告别。

dinner.notes: Departure day. Likely no dinner or in-flight meal.
dinner.notes_local: 出发日。可能没有晚餐或飞机餐。

notes: All restaurant recommendations verified via Gaode Maps POI search and Google Maps. Key highlights: (1) Day 1 Chongqing: Breakfast at Raffles City after observation deck, NO hotpot for lunch, HILLSIDE HOTPOT with night view at Nanshan (南山半山腰) for dinner. (2) Day 2 Bazhong: All family meals at home for Chinese New Year Eve. (3) Day 3: MUST-VISIT 老五酱肉包子 for breakfast and 老七牛肉 for lunch in Bazhong, dinner at QINSHANZHAI (钦膳斋) near Jinli Ancient Street - mature Sichuan restaurant replacing Taolin, verified open during Spring Festival. (4) Day 4 UPDATED (2026-02-05): Breakfast at 八二小区抄手 (82 Community Wontons) Jianshe Road flagship - famous local Sichuan wonton breakfast (opens 07:00, ¥21 per person, rating 4.6). Lunch at 明婷小馆 (Mingting Xiaoguan) Taikoo Li flagship - ⚠️ CRITICAL TIMING WARNING: Opens at 11:00 only, user must arrive exactly at opening, 45-minute window before airport departure, high-risk schedule with zero delay margin (¥75 per person, rating 4.7, verified via Gaode Maps POI ID B0KB17BRRJ). ⚠️ DINNER UPDATED (2026-02-05): Replaced Sichuan restaurant with HIGH-QUALITY JAPANESE at 老乾杯 (Lao Gan Bei) Shanghai Bund Flagship - premium Japanese yakiniku at iconic Bund No. 5, 5th floor (¥610 per person = $84 USD, rating 4.7 - HIGHEST RATED, Gaode POI ID: B0FFG7UM6X). Perfect location 500m from hotel, sophisticated atmosphere, specializes in premium wagyu beef and kaiseki courses. RESERVATIONS HIGHLY RECOMMENDED. (5) Day 5 UPDATED (2026-02-05): Breakfast at Always Coffee Roaster (specialty coffee near hotel). Lunch at 人和馆 (Renheguan) Zaojiabang Road branch - MICHELIN-RECOMMENDED Shanghai Benbang cuisine (¥186 per person, rating 4.8, Gaode POI ID: B0FFF407ML). Dinner at AJIYA Jing'an Branch - Japanese yakiniku (¥127 per person, rating 4.5, Gaode POI ID: B0FFIVKQPF, phone: 021 6446 9999). All three Day 5 dining options researched per user requirements (Michelin restaurant, Renheguan, Ajiya). Alternative Michelin options identified: Fu He Hui (vegetarian, rating 4.7), Yongfoo Elite (rating 4.1), Mr&Mrs Bund (rating 4.6). (6) Shanghai Days 5-7: Includes MICHELIN restaurants (人和馆 Benbang cuisine, AJIYA Japanese yakiniku, Bairong Shandong cuisine). (7) Beijing Days 8-21: Class schedule constraints on Tue/Wed/Thu (no far trips during day). University area restaurants near Tsinghua/Peking. Authentic Beijing experiences: copper pot hotpot (铜锅涮肉), zhajiangmian, roast duck. (8) Day 16: Optional Tianjin day trip with Tianjin specialties. (9) Day 20: Special farewell dinner for final night together. TOTAL ESTIMATED MEAL COST: Approximately 1,845 USD for 2 people over 21 days (excluding Day 2 family meals, updated after Day 4 dinner change from $13 to $84 = +$71 USD).
